016
017package org.parboiled.trees;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.List;
022import static imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions.*;
023
024/**
025 * A base implementation of the {@link MutableTreeNode}.
026 *
027 * @param <T> the actual implementation type of this MutableTreeNodeImpl
028 */
029public class MutableTreeNodeImpl<T extends MutableTreeNode<T>> implements MutableTreeNode<T> {
030
031    private final List<T> children = new ArrayList<T>();
032    private final List<T> childrenView = Collections.unmodifiableList(children);
033    private T parent;
034
035    public T getParent() {
036        return parent;
037    }
038
039    public List<T> getChildren() {
040        return childrenView;
041    }
042
043    public void addChild(int index, T child) {
044        checkElementIndex(index, children.size() + 1);
045
046        // detach new child from old parent
047        if (child != null) {
048            if (child.getParent() == this) return;
049            if (child.getParent() != null) {
050                TreeUtils.removeChild(child.getParent(), child);
051            }
052        }
053
054        // attach new child
055        children.add(index, child);
056        setParent(child, this);
057    }
058
059    public void setChild(int index, T child) {
060        checkElementIndex(index, children.size());
061
062        // detach old child
063        T old = children.get(index);
064        if (old == child) return;
065        setParent(old, null);
066
067        // detach new child from old parent
068        if (child != null && child.getParent() != this) {
069            TreeUtils.removeChild(child.getParent(), child);
070        }
071
072        // attach new child
073        children.set(index, child);
074        setParent(child, this);
075    }
076
077    public T removeChild(int index) {
078        checkElementIndex(index, children.size());
079        T removed = children.remove(index);
080        setParent(removed, null);
081        return removed;
082    }
083
084    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
085    private static <T extends MutableTreeNode<T>> void setParent(T node, MutableTreeNodeImpl<T> parent) {
086        if (node != null) {
087            ((MutableTreeNodeImpl) node).parent = parent;
088        }
089    }
090
091}
